SweepShape< WorldTriangle > Class Template Reference

This is the instantiation of the SweepShape template for a WorldTriangle, which swept through the chunk space makes a prism. More...

Detailed Description

template<>
class SweepShape< WorldTriangle >

This is the instantiation of the SweepShape template for a WorldTriangle, which swept through the chunk space makes a prism.
